column4: Hello all, I had a quick question about ubuntu (specifically network remix): I used to use Archlinux but I accidently destroyed it and don't want to reset it, can ubuntu be used just text-based and only load up graphical programs like firefox?
don't get what you mean with text baed but graphic load...
then the same thing pdragon_ asked
install a server version or install a full ubuntu and disable GDM service
